message.body: ... Just noticed this now! Oops
Any dinner plans?
Oh hey. Whoops
I'm jus waiting for the train
My cupboard is totally bare, I have to go to the grocery
I am sick of takeout!!
Are you making dinner or eating out?
Making split pea soup i think, bought the ingredients yesterday but didn't have the gumption to make it
... A little warm for soup, but it makes good leftovers / work lunches
So much of my meal planning is about maximizing the chance of leftovers
Def saves $$ that way.
And time, I can never find time to go out and get lunch during the workday
Yeah, nice to have something with you to eat at yr desk. You should try to get out sometimes though!
Sometimes a change of scenery really helps clear the mind and you can get more done when you get back!
Oh I know. It's a daily goal but I usually fail!
Also good for clearing the mind: game of thrones ... Have you seen it?
No but I've heard so much about it. I'm afraid of getting sucked in
Does it live up to the hype
You will. If you have some days off with bad weather, you can blow through a season or 2
It does, if you're into fantasy]type stuff
I'm more of a downton abbey person :). But my twitter feed is so full of references to game of thrones I'm starting to be tempted
I like downton abbey too! I'm kind of a sucker for period stuff
